participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and a bit rebellious, enjoys exploring new things but struggles with academics.
participant_1.background: I ride the bus to school. My brother is older than me. I'm 13 years old. I hate math class.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and hardworking, dedicated to both his job and charitable causes.
participant_2.background: I volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. My favorite color is navy blue. I work fulltime in a shipyard. I donate a part of my salary to charity each month.
